summary: The diff shows implementation of the eagle logo replacement, entrance animation, and navbar responsive improvements. However, several key requirements are missing or incomplete, and there is evidence of constraint violations.

missing_requirements.requirement: Logo rendered in SVG format for scalability
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows the logo is implemented as a PNG image (/assets/generated/eagle-logo.dim_512x512.png) rather than SVG format as specified in acceptance criteria

missing_requirements.requirement: Old logo completely removed from all components
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not show removal of old logo assets or references. No evidence of old logo deletion in modified files

missing_requirements.requirement: Logo file size optimization and compression
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence in diff of logo compression or file size optimization. The PNG file is referenced but no compression implementation shown

missing_requirements.requirement: Performance monitoring for Core Web Vitals (LCP, FID, CLS)
missing_requirements.reason: No implementation of Core Web Vitals monitoring or measurement in the diff

missing_requirements.requirement: Email single-line display implementation with no wrapping on all screen sizes
missing_requirements.reason: Navbar.tsx is truncated and does not show the complete email implementation or responsive styling for single-line display across all breakpoints

hallucinated_features.description: Continuous hover effects and animations on logo
hallucinated_features.reason: EagleLogo.tsx implements hover scale and glow intensification effects that were not requested. BuildRequest specified entrance animation only, not ongoing hover interactions

hallucinated_features.description: Radial background glow with pulse animation
hallucinated_features.reason: Added continuous pulse-glow-bg animation on background element beyond the single entrance animation requirement
